name: Bread Winner
description:
Bread Winner is a bread-based 2D endless runner where players strive to be the last bread standing and have the honour of becoming toasted. Run, jump, and avoid forks of death, scorching stoves, and other deadly kitchen devices as you battle against friends and family. All the while collecting butter to slide and boost you forwards, peanut butter whirlpools to suck in your competitors, and other culinary items to boost your toast or sabotage other bread.

The Characters

   Louie Loaf - Louis lives to be toasted. It is the classic bread boy's life-long dream to follow his toasted ancestors.

   Betty Bagel - A basic bread with sesame and poppy seeds on it. She is a kind bread who wishes to become slightly crisp.

   Beau Baguette - A bread français scheming to become toasted. I wouldn't trust Beau, but I think he only wants to be toasted...?

   Sabrina SwissRoll - A dizzy, swirly bread who wants to be toasted despite being a cake. Sabrina is pretty dizzy, but can still run in a straight line somehow.

   Carl Croissant - A sad, flakey pastry. Carl didn't really want to be toasted but is here anyway because he wasn't finished by someone.
   Barry BreadRoll - Barry, a small round bun and distant cousin of Beau (and less shady), would happily be toasted and served with some butter~    Sarah Scone - A British blueberry biscuit willing to be crisp and served with some jam. Maybe not blueberry jam though...

   Mary Muffin - A bit of an angry muffin that may or may not want revenge against the toaster

The Buffs/Items

 Butter Slide - Slide on some butter to get a temporary speed boost and run ahead of others (and be slightly buttery if toasted)

  Jelly Tar Trap - Place the trap on the counter top for players to get stuck in and stop them    Butter Knives - Throw knives at other breads to stun and slow anther player down   Sandwich Bag - A protective layer to make you temporarily invincible from obstacles

   Peanut Butter Whirlpool - A sticky whirlpool that drags opposing players inside the gooey mess with little way to escape

Music 

Royalty Free Music from Bensound

Genres: local multiplayer, platformer, last-one-standing wins, racing, endless runner

If there are any problems while playing, to close the game press the ESC or the Start button
